title: Chess for dumbs - #AluraQuiz
description: Put your beginner's chess knowledge to test and let's see how little you know about it.

questions.title: How many files
questions.description: How many files there are in a Chess board?

questions.title: Castling
alternatives: The ability to change the positions between the King and the Rook.
The ability to move 2 files in a single move with the pawns.
The ability to capture a pawn after he moves two files by going to the jumped file.
The ability to promote your pawn after reaching the other side of the board.

questions.title: En Passant
alternatives: The ability to change the positions between the King and the Rook to the Queen's side.
The ability to move 2 files in a single move with the pawns.
The ability to capture a pawn after he moves two files by going to the jumped file.
The ability to exchange your promoted pawn to a Queen after reaching the other side of the board.
The ability to change the positions between the King and the Rook to the King's side.

questions.title: Piece on D1 at start
questions.description: Which piece is on D1 at the beggining of the game?

questions.title: Piece on E8 at start
questions.description: Which piece is on E8 at the beggining of the game?

questions.title: Fastest checkmate
questions.description: Which sequence describes the fastest checkmate in Chess?
